successes.title: Pressy - the Almighty Android Button!
successes.description: Pressy brings back simplicity to your phone. Perform your favorite and most common actions with a simple, intuitive physical button.

Pledges.description:
WE LIKE YOU TOO!  •  
Thank you for believing in our product. You will receive the biggest personal “Thank you!” on our website as well as all updates and future offers… and a virtual bear hug.

The Pressy T-shirt • 
Get a cool Pressy t-shirt that we printed just for you; get clicked and share your support for Pressy in fashion!
EARLY BEARS SPECIAL!  •  The first 300 pledgers will receive one black Pressy button with free access to the Pressy App, all features included for FREE!

THE BASIC PRESSY DEAL •
Get one black Pressy button with free access to the Pressy App, all features included for FREE!

THE BASIC PRESSY DEAL + A PRESSY KEY CHAIN • 
Get the ALL-INCLUSIVE PRESSY BASIC DEAL including one Pressy key chain.
Perfect for those who use their headset frequently and want to keep Pressy in a safe place.

THE PRESSY COLOR DEAL •
Get the ALL-INCLUSIVE PRESSY BASIC DEAL with the option to accessorize your phone with the Pressy color collection. Choose from white, red,or blue.

THE BASIC PRESSY DEAL + A PRESSY KEY CHAIN • 
Get the ALL-INCLUSIVE PRESSY BASIC DEAL including one Pressy key chain.
Perfect for those who use their headset frequently and want to keep Pressy in a safe place.

THE AWESOME PRESSY DEAL •
Get the ALL-INCLUSIVE PRESSY COLOR DEAL + KEY CHAIN!
The NEW Kickstarter Edition! Good old Pressy+Keychain deal, now in KS-Green edition.

THE PRESTIGE PRESSY GOLD DEAL  • 
Get the gold-coated Pressy button + key chain.

API IMPLEMENTATION • 
Get the Pressy Awesome Deal and API implementation. Please contact us before pledging.
